modName: Improved Unarmed Sounds and Animations for Vampires
descriptionHtml:
Improved version of this mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42700/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42700/?[/url]. Original description:
"- Unarmed attack animations to claw attack animations
- Unarmed idle animations to vanilla magic-wielding animations
- Fist swing sounds to vampire lord claw swing sounds
- Fist impact sounds to werewolf claw impact sounds.
Currently affects all playable races, including NPCs (this is a WIP)
Make sure the .esp is at the bottom of your load order."

In this version i made minor fix and now two button power attack get new cool beast animation like was planed.
Also i understand why some people complain about mod not working for them. If you install this mod when you already vampire it not change your vampire into beast race, so some animation for example strike from sneak will be close handed. You need first become normal and when become vampire again. For example for dark elf you need type in console: player.setrace darkelfrace and when type: player.setrace darkelfracevampire

Claws at screenshots is separate mod, the older version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5910/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5910/?[/url] you can find it here http://www.loverslab.com/topic/3041-old-kaws-claws/

I will remove this mod when author include this changes into original mod.
author: Xom94oK
